<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Blight Bomb](/Equipment.aspx?ID=684)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Bomb" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=21" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
<trait label="Splash" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=150" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 252 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Strike</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Blight bombs contain volatile toxic chemicals that rot flesh. A blight bomb deals the listed poison damage, [persistent poison damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29), and splash damage. Many types grant an item bonus to attack rolls.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 1"
pfs="Standard"
>
Blight Bomb (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 252 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bomb deals 1d6 poison damage, 1d4 persistent poison damage, and 1 poison splash damage.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Standard"
>
Blight Bomb (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 252 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 10 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals 2d6 poison damage, 2d4 persistent poison damage, and 2 poison splash damage.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Blight Bomb (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 252 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 250 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals 3d6 poison damage, 3d4 persistent poison damage, and 3 poison splash damage.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs="Standard"
>
Blight Bomb (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 252 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 2,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +3 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals 4d6 poison damage, 4d4 persistent poison damage, and 4 poison splash damage.
